instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Artifacts and freezes. Intermitant.
threads.message:
First tested RAM then noticed this machine looks to have had a fall.
The machine will boot and run fine. However when tapping left side of the palm rest gently it will artifact and freeze.

My guess would be damage as result of impact, and to find whatever came slightly unstuck.

Any ideas on where to start please?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Artifacts and freezes. Intermitant.
threads.message: Ripped up pads on one of the RAM slots, usually the one closest to the trackpad. Max out the remaining slot, repair not possible.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-3115 Artifacts and freezes. Intermitant.
threads.message:
Thanks!.
Sure enough, RAM slot closest to trackpad empty = no freezing.

Thank you both.
